short_summary: Hardware and software support and maintenance for DND
description: This is a solicitation for support and maintenance for the software and hardware for Defence, National Defence (DND). The solicitation is looking for a vendor to provide the services for a period of one (1) year with possibility of extension. The services required include installation, maintenance, support, and technical assistance.
duration_in_months: One (1) year with possibility of extension

full_summary:
Government of Canada - A Request for Proposal - Procurement

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
**Number:** SSC-23-00023658:T

**Project:** Shared Services Canada Solicitation for Hardware and Software (HW/SW) Support and Maintenance Services for the Department of National Defence (DND)

**RFP Description:**
Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites interested bidders to submit a bid for the provision of HW/SW support and maintenance services for DND. The scope of work encompasses the delivery of HW/SW support and maintenance services, as described in Annex A of the Request for Quote (RFQ).

**Contract Period:** October 11, 2023, to October 10, 2024

**Electronic Submission of Bids:**
Bidders are required to submit their bids electronically through the P2P portal by the closing date and time indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation.

**Registration:**
To participate, bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca) and click "Register Now" to gain access to solicitations, submit responses, and receive updates and amendments.

**Procurement Method:**
This procurement is conducted using an open bidding process, allowing all interested bidders to participate.

**Notes:**
Amendment 1 has been issued to modify the contract duration, correct a service start date, and co-term end dates. Amendment 2 has been issued to extend the closing date and remove items related to Nvidia from the list of deliverables. Amendment 3 has extended the closing date to September 28th, 2023, at 14:00 h (EST) without any other changes to the RFQ.

**Attachments:**
A document outlining the RFP and the associated amendments can be accessed at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/CFE52A44-A9A1-4D91-8443-F070117DDA17](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/CFE52A44-A9A1-4D91-8443-F070117DDA17).

**Points of Contact:**
Shared Services Canada
90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON K1P 6K2
Phone: 613-302
